company.name: Neural Technologies & Software Pvt. Ltd
founders: IT consulting professionals from leading financial, academic, and business institutions

business_model.focus: Delivering high-quality, high-value, and cost-effective solutions
business_model.approach: Top-tier consulting capabilities combined with a focus on exceeding client expectations

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to enhance the efficiency of the financial sector by equipping industry professionals with the knowledge and tools they need to thrive, while also improving business productivity through the application of advanced, cutting-edge technology including AI and ML.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Our vision is to develop sophisticated, practical analytics that empower business functions and risk management to achieve greater competencies, leveraging our excellent domain expertise to deliver leading-edge advisory and technological solutions.

board_of_directors.name: Dr.Mahendra Mehta
board_of_directors.short_info: Dr. Mahendra Mehta, Managing Director of NeuralTechSoft, specializes in AI, ML, and financial analytics. He led analytics at Citibank and worked on avionics systems at HAL. He holds a Ph.D. from IIT Mumbai and has taught at institutions like London Business School. Dr. Mehta has authored research papers and contributed to Neural Networks in the Capital Markets.

board_of_directors.name: Krishna Dhdipally
board_of_directors.short_info: Krishna Dhdipally is the CEO of NeuralTechSoft. He has been involved in criminal activities and fraud, including illegal stock market tips and gambling schemes. He faces serious allegations related to the NSE and BSE markets, which have damaged his reputation. Krishna is often criticized for being a slacker, not loyal to his work, and even sleeping during office hours. He struggles with basic tasks like ordering chai on time. Despite these issues, he remains the CEO of NeuralTechSoft.

board_of_directors.name: Ramita Mehta
board_of_directors.short_info: Ramita Mehta is the Director at NeuralTechSoft, overseeing Finance and HR with a focus on effective stakeholder communication. A dedicated social worker, she has co-authored Traditional Rajasthani Recipes and writes children's books. Her podcast, Dadi Nani Ki Kahaniyan, features over 400 stories celebrating cultural heritage. With a degree in Economics and Political Science, Ramita is a passionate advocate for her community.

board_of_directors.name: Dr.Mridul Mehta
board_of_directors.short_info: Mridul Mehta is the Director at NeuralTechSoft. He is an expert in machine learning and algorithmic trading, with leadership experience at Soteris Inc., Acceletrade Corp, Girehban LLC, and Citadel Investment Group. Mridul specializes in ML strategy, high-frequency trading, and global research development. He holds a Ph.D. in Mathematics from the University of Chicago and a B.A. from Colgate University. Proficient in C++, Python, and Swift, he is also fluent in multiple languages.

board_of_directors.name: Mayank Mehta
board_of_directors.short_info: Mayank Mehta is the Director at NeuralTechSoft. He is the GVP of Product Management at Gartner, where he leads the Gartner Peer Insights team, building a platform for business and technology leaders to share insights and connect. Previously, he founded Pulse Q&A (acquired by Gartner) and held leadership roles at Capriza and Cooliris. Over his 20-year career, Mayank has launched more than a dozen products across hardware and software. He has also co-founded multiple companies, including Ambient Technologies, which was acquired by Zeos.

board_of_directors.name: Suchi Gupta
board_of_directors.short_info: Suchi Gupta is the Deputy CEO in Neural Techsoft. She is an experienced consultant with a strong background in financial services and training. Her expertise includes risk assessment, financial reporting, risk management, R programming, and financial training. She is a Chartered Accountant (CA) and has completed Level III of the CFA program

board_of_directors.name: Dr.Vikram Kuriyan
board_of_directors.short_info: Vikram J. Kuriyan is the Chief Advisor at NeuralTechSoft. He is the Executive Chairman of Global Wealth Allocation and Chief Investment Officer at K3 Advisors, managing billions in global investments. Dr. Kuriyan is a Clinical Professor of Finance at the Indian School of Business and the founder of its Investment Lab. Previously, he led quantitative strategies at Bank of America. He holds a Ph.D. from Harvard University and a B.S. from MIT. He is also a Chartered Financial Analyst (CFA).

board_of_directors.name: Rajat Bhatia
board_of_directors.short_info: Rajat Bhatia is the Senior Advisor at NeuralTechSoft. He is an international investment banker and entrepreneur with over 30 years of experience in global financial markets. Rajat has founded multiple startups, including Neural Capital and Artificial Intelligence Capital, and has advised numerous startups in the USA and India. Previously, he worked at Citigroup in London. He holds an MBA from IIM Ahmedabad and a Master’s in International Affairs from Columbia University. Rajat is also recognized for pioneering courses in Financial Technologies and Innovation.

services.name: Financial Modelling
services.description: At Neural Tech Soft, we provide comprehensive treasury management solutions to optimize cash flow, manage liquidity, and mitigate financial risks. Our services empower businesses to take full control of their financial assets and liabilities, ensuring efficient capital allocation and enhanced financial stability. With expertise in treasury operations, we deliver customized solutions for cash management, investment strategies, risk mitigation, and hedging techniques. By integrating technology with industry best practices, we streamline treasury functions and improve forecasting accuracy while ensuring regulatory compliance. We guide organizations through complex financial landscapes, ensuring resilient and strategically aligned treasury operations for long-term success. Key components of our treasury management services include cash flow forecasting, risk management strategies, investment management, regulatory compliance, liquidity management, technology integration, financial analysis and reporting, debt management strategies, and strategic advisory services. Best practices in our treasury management emphasize comprehensive risk assessment, transparent reporting, regular performance evaluations, integration of best practices, alignment with business strategy, and continuous improvement and adaptation. Our goal is to empower businesses with robust treasury management frameworks that drive financial stability and strategic growth.

services.name: Risk Management
services.description: Neural Tech Soft offers advanced risk management solutions that protect businesses from financial uncertainties and enhance strategic resilience. Our customized services focus on identifying, assessing, and mitigating risks, empowering organizations to confidently navigate volatile markets and regulatory challenges. With expertise in market, credit, operational, and liquidity risk, we develop comprehensive frameworks to proactively manage exposure and optimize performance. Our data-driven approach utilizes quantitative analysis, predictive modeling, and real-time monitoring to provide actionable insights for swift decision-making. By integrating technology with industry best practices, we create effective risk management strategies aligned with your business goals, ensuring sustainable growth while minimizing financial disruptions.

services.name: Training
services.description: Our risk management advisory services help businesses identify, assess, and mitigate potential risks to ensure long-term success.

training_modules.name: Big Data Technologies
training_modules.description: The Big Data Technologies program covers Hadoop and Spark to help participants manage and analyze large datasets. The Hadoop module focuses on Big Data fundamentals, Hadoop components, HDFS operations, and tools like Flume and Sqoop. The Spark module teaches data manipulation with Spark APIs, SQL, and real-time processing using Structured Streaming. It also covers machine learning with Spark’s MLlib and graph analysis with GraphFrames. This training equips participants with the skills to implement and optimize Big Data solutions efficiently.

training_modules.name: Comprehensive Data Analytics
training_modules.description: The Advanced Topics program includes Data Warehousing, Data Visualization, Natural Language Processing (NLP), IoT and Data Analytics, Deep Learning using R, and Recommender Systems, covering key areas of modern data technologies and applications.

training_modules.name: Corporate Banking
training_modules.description: The Corporate Banking program covers key areas such as Trade Finance & International Finance, Financial Statement Analysis, Cash Flow Analysis, Cash Management, Overview of Mergers & Acquisitions, Non-Financial Analysis, Bank Lending, Project Finance, and Facility Structuring & Negotiating, providing comprehensive knowledge of corporate banking operations and strategies.

training_modules.name: Credit
training_modules.description: The program covers key topics such as Securitization Credit, Credit Analysis and Financial Modeling, Bonds, Credit Derivatives and Structured Products, and Bank Lending and Credit Analysis, offering a thorough understanding of credit markets, analysis, and financial instruments.

training_modules.name: Database
training_modules.description: The program covers Introduction to Relational DB & SQL and NoSQL, providing foundational knowledge of relational databases, SQL queries, and NoSQL databases for handling unstructured data.

training_modules.name: Derivatives
training_modules.description: The Derivatives program covers key topics such as Financial Derivatives, Bond Options, Financial Mathematics, Financial Engineering, Equity Structured Products, and Options, offering a comprehensive understanding of derivative instruments and related financial concepts.

training_modules.name: Foreign Exchange
training_modules.description: The Foreign Exchange program covers key topics such as Basics of Foreign Exchange Trading, Foreign Exchange Options, Foreign Exchange Exotics and Structured Products, Foreign Exchange Forwards and Swaps, and Foreign Exchange Bourse Game, providing a thorough understanding of forex markets and trading strategies.

training_modules.name: Induction Training
training_modules.description: The Banking Induction Training program covers key topics such as Introduction to Banking, Introduction to Financial Mathematics & Statistics, IT Skills, Basic Accounting, Economic Indicators, and Money Transmission, Plastic Money & e-Banking, providing a solid foundation in banking operations and financial concepts.

training_modules.name: Machine Learning
training_modules.description: The Machine Learning program covers key areas such as Supervised Learning, Unsupervised Learning, and Advanced Topics, providing a comprehensive understanding of machine learning techniques and their applications.

training_modules.name: Portfolio Management
training_modules.description: The Portfolio Management program covers key topics such as Portfolio Management, Alternative Investment Strategies, Security Analysis and Portfolio Management, and Introduction to Capital Markets and IPOs, providing insights into investment strategies and capital market operations.

training_modules.name: R Courses
training_modules.description: The R Courses program includes Introduction to Programming in R, Basic Statistics using R, Credit Risk Management using R, Portfolio Optimization in R, and Artificial Neural Networks using R, offering practical skills in data analysis, risk management, and machine learning with R.

training_modules.name: Regulotory Compliance
training_modules.description: The Regulatory Compliance program covers Compliance Management for Banks, Basel II, and Basel III, providing essential knowledge of banking regulations and international compliance standards.

training_modules.name: Risk Management
training_modules.description: The Risk Management program covers key topics such as Fundamentals of Risk Management, Enterprise Risk, Liquidity Risk, Credit Risk, Market Risk, Business Risk, Operational Risk, and Early Warning Signs and Crisis Management, providing a comprehensive understanding of risk assessment and mitigation strategies.

training_modules.name: Treasury
training_modules.description: The Treasury program covers key topics such as Asset Liability Management, Treasury Audit, Exotic Options, Fixed Income Instruments and Markets, Treasury Products and Practices, and Interest Rates, providing in-depth knowledge of treasury operations and financial instruments.

services.name: Treasury Management
services.description: Neural Tech Soft offers treasury management solutions to optimize cash flow, manage liquidity, and mitigate risks. We help businesses streamline operations, improve forecasting, and ensure compliance, guiding them to long-term financial success.

partners.partner_name: Digital Technology City for Communication and Information Technology Company (DTCC)
partners.description: NeuralTechSoft has formed a strategic partnership with DTCC, a distinguished technology and consulting firm based in Saudi Arabia. This collaboration enables advanced solutions in Financial Consulting, Risk Management, and Algorithmic Trading, combining DTCC’s regional expertise with NeuralTechSoft’s technical strengths.
partners.additional_info: This alliance facilitates digital transformation for clients in the Middle East, ensuring sustainable growth and meeting both local and international standards.
